column4: Blueskaj: the router has 4 or 5 ports, I've tried them all, nothing works
you're trying to connect a computer to the cable modem that is not usually connected?

I typically don't use a router. I go straight from the modem to the comptuer. I never had a problem, but today the desktop wouldn't recognize the wired connection. So I set up the linksys so I could wire in my laptop and get online

power off everything. call Comcast and ask them to clear the MAC address associated with your modem and its circuit. tell them you want to set up a router. they may help you, they may not. but you deifnitely want that circuit bound to the MAC address of the WAN interface of the BEFSR41.
